title: Stir-fried beef in oyster sauce
ingredients: ['500g sirloin beef steak, cut across the grain into thin slices', '1 tablespoon oyster sauce', '1 pinch ground white pepper', '1/4 teaspoon sugar', '1 teaspoon rice wine', '1/2 teaspoon finely chopped ginger', '1 pinch salt', 'water as needed', '1 pinch salt', 'oil as needed', '5 stalks flowering Chinese cabbage (choy sum)', 'For the Sauce', '1 tablespoon oyster sauce', '1/8 teaspoon sugar', '1 teaspoon cornflour', '4 tablespoons cooking oil']
